title: Piranha Type ID
content:
I'm sure I will be shamed by how easy an ID this is, but I can't think of it (it's been one of those weeks, and it's only Tuesday). The R and the P are very distinct and quite lovely.

Thanks in advance.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Piranha.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014115855/http:/typophile.com/files/Piranha.jpg) | 96.34 KB |
author: Corey Holms

comments.content:
That's it, thank you. Again, a super fast ID.  
Neil Bold is certainly a handsome typeface.

See if you can spot the difference (or in this case simularity)...

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014115855im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Coincidence_4296.jpg)
  
Roger Corman was the executive producer of both; God bless him!
Apparently Roger Corman knows what he likes!
